llm_text:
Why: The model flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach (value=1; SHAP=+2.82801, strong increase), together with high amount_received (12481.9; SHAP=+0.851023, increase), dayofweek (6 — Sunday; SHAP=+0.756385, increase), and amount_paid (12481.9; SHAP=+0.735158, increase). These four features—an ACH payment (payment_format_ach=1) of sizable equal paid/received amounts (amount_received and amount_paid = 12,481.9) occurring on dayofweek=6—collectively raised the model score.

Conclusion: Based solely on these drivers, the model flagged the transaction because an ACH transfer of a relatively large amount on a Sunday increased risk. If ACH (payment_format_ach=1) coincides with high amounts and a weekend day (dayofweek=6), the model is more likely to flag.
